Name: mymediaforalexa
Overview: A media server that allows you to stream audio files (e.g. music and audiobooks) that are stored on your unRAID server to Alexa enabled devices such as Amazon Echo or Amazon Dot using voice control.[p]

RecommendedReason.en_US: Nothing beats being able to play your own music collection on your Alexa device

datafolder.Name: Data folder
datafolder.Description: The location for config settings and indexing information

medialibrary.Name: Media Library
medialibrary.Description: The location of the media to be handled by My Media For Alexa

alexaport.Name: Alexa port
alexaport.Description:
Port used to communicate with Alexa
<p>MUST NOT BE CHANGED</p>

adminport.Name: Admin port
adminport.Description:
Admin port used to manage My Media For Alexa
<p>MUST NOT BE CHANGED</p>
